meanings.definition: A small metal ball used in the game of marbles.
meanings.sent1: I won a game of marbles by shooting my steelie into the circle.
meanings.sent2: The children played marbles, each trying to hit the steelie with their shooter.
meanings.sent3: The steelie rolled away, causing laughter among the kids playing marbles.
meanings.sent4: The steelie spun like a tiny planet in the marble universe.
meanings.sent5: The shiny steelie gleamed under the sunlight, attracting everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The steelie door of the safe kept the treasures secure.
meanings.sent2: The sword had a steelie blade that gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The steelie armor made the knight look like a walking fortress.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a steelie quality that commanded attention.
meanings.sent5: The steelie structure of the building made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A type of spinning top made of steel.
meanings.sent1: The steelie spun gracefully on the floor, mesmerizing everyone.
meanings.sent2: He collected various steelies, each with a unique design.
meanings.sent3: The steelie danced around like a tiny metallic ballerina.
meanings.sent4: The steelie whirled with such speed that it seemed like a blur.
meanings.sent5: The steelie's spin was so smooth, it seemed almost magical.
